description.narrative: System of administrative registers and integrated system of surveys in educational matters incorporate the monitoring of quality of education, taking into account the indigenous peoples and communities attended, territorial criteria (municipal and parochial), by sex and life cycle., which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2019, UNICEF will have contributed to ensuring that children and adolescents (particularly the most excluded) are attending and remaining within educational facilities and that these latter are improving their quality of teaching and educational content, using a rights, gender, adolescent development, intercultural and bilingual approach.

sector.narrative: Education Management Information System (EMIS) (excluding learning assessment systems)
System strengthening - inclusive education for other vulnerable children poorest quintile, ethnic/linguistic minorities, migrant children, non-citizens/undocumented children etc.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: System of administrative registers and integrated system of surveys in educational matters incorporate the monitoring of quality of education, taking into account the indigenous peoples and communities attended, territorial criteria (municipal and parochial), by sex and life cycle.

description.narrative: Not implemented. This output was not part of the VCO priorities to 2019 | Status:No Progress | As-of Date:10/02/2020

title.narrative: Number of statistical operations on quality in education that offer disaggregated data, allow the identification of barriers and bottlenecks, including those associated with gender, and are used for the formulation, implementation and monitoring of policies with equity focus

baseline.value: Actualmente existe una operacin estadstica en materia educativa que mide acceso y permanencia pero no mide la calidad de la educacin ni su pertinencia. Las estadsticas de acceso tienen limitacione

target.value: 2019:Al menos dos operaciones estadísticas (registros administrativos y encuesta) que medirán la calidad y pertinencia educativa, con datos desagregados por etnia, territorio, sexo y ciclo de vida

actual.value: 2019:Not implemented. This output was not part of the VCO priorities to 2019

title.narrative: System Strengthening - Learning assessment - Existence of a national/system-level large scale assessment, including for early grades - score (1-4), see guidance

baseline.value: No existe un sistema de evaluacin de los resultados de aprendizaje

target.value: 2019:Al menos dos operaciones estad¿icas (registros administrativos y encuesta) que medir¿la calidad y pertinencia educativa, con datos desagregados por etnia, territorio, sexo y ciclo de vida
